snippet.title: GMOTA release trailer
snippet.description:
Get it here!
https://combine-kegan.itch.io/gmota

Wanna support me? You could always take a look at my new patreon https://www.patreon.com/CombineKegan
An update that's been nearly a year in the making, GMOTA version 1.0 has finally hit. Providing a massive overhaul in gameplay mechanics, new subweapons, new upgrades, and brand new abilities, making this the biggest, best version of GMOTA to date

A gameplay modification for GZDoom and Zandronum 3.0, GMOTA features arcade inspired melee combat and 20 different monsters to cut down. Load it alongside with your favorite mapset and Go Medieval On Their Asses.





This update also brings a surprise guest.

Maps used for the trailer:
Unreleased personal map meant for DUMP 2 years ago
Brotherhood of Ruin
Preacher.wad
Epic
castle nevermore
Slaughtenstein1802
Vanguard
Scythe 1
Scythe 2
